product_name: WTB Rocket V Race Saddle - Men's
long_description: The Rocket V Race is Wilderness Trail Bike's most popular high-performance saddle both on the road and in the dirt. Uniquely contoured pad shape helps increase power output by properly angling the sit bones. Flex-Tuned(TM) shell boasts a mix of comfortable flex and firm efficiency; it's not too hard and it's not too soft. Love Channel(R) protects body from unwanted pressure; central depression offers soft-tissue relief without sacrificing structural integrity. Pressure relief zones in sensitive areas provide long-term comfort so you can stay in the saddle longer. Corners and sides are reinforced to protect from rips and tears.
short_description: The Rocket V Race is Wilderness Trail Bike's most popular high-performance saddle both on the road and in the dirt.
